pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Grouped Weighted Quantile Sum Regression // Fits Bayesian grouped weighted quantile sum (BGWQS) regressions for one or more chemical groups with binary outcomes. Wheeler DC et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.sste.2019.100286. Wheeler DC et al. (2020) doi:10.3390/ijerph17082864.
